title: Catch-up on New Project
content: The conversations went well and now Ricardo is waiting for the funding to be signed off before the project is started.

title: Het Leven van Denis - Kick-off
content: The project has been officially kicked-off. The teams have started their activities and there needs to be a format report in place in 3 months time.

title: Discussion with Jason Giles
content: Had a discussion with Jason about the services offered by the MRC Studio and Jason seemed to be impressed. Jason will be reaching out after conversations with his team-members.

title: Second Discussion with Jason Giles
content: Had a second discussion with Jason. He will be reaching out after conversations with his team-members.

title: This is a note for Jimmy
content: Jimmy and I need to have a catch up in 3 months from now. We are monitoring how the application is responding to Jimmy's requests.

title: Contact Paige by Next Month
content: Here is a reminder to contact Paige.
